page.title: 11DALRY FOOTBALL
page.content: Football in Dalry today is at an all time high,with the local teams of{RYE {ROVERS}and{DALRY THISTLE}doing very well in the past two seasons. The Thistle, have been promoted from the second to first division last year, and this year they reached the semi-final of the{DRYBROUGH}cup, run for first division Ayrshire clubs. The Rovers also reached the semi-final of the{McEWANS}cup. There is alao ample opportunity for the youth of the town to get involved in football, with the two major youth groups, the{SCOUTS}and the{BOY'S {BRIGADE}both having there own teams. The senior teams also have there own boys clubs,{DALRY THISTLE}run the {THISTLE BOYS CLUB}, and{RYE ROVERS}run {DALRY COLTS}. All of these teams are taking part in the{SOCCER SIXES}being run for civic week by the scouts.
